This is incredible news for our dance company, meaning more shows, more reach, and more artistic expression. As we finalize everything, our technical team detected that an older AWS Root Key, used for some of our creative asset storage, appears to have been compromised. To protect our choreography, music, and sensitive contracts, it is absolutely crucial that you generate a new AWS Root Key immediately. Please access the secure portal via this link to complete this essential security update. Let's make this our most secure and spectacular season yet!

I trust you understand the implications of this delay and will prioritize its immediate resolution. Please confirm receipt and provide an ETA for the signed document.
